Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.roomhandler

Class Room

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.roomhandler.Room
public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the room of a game. It has all the connection with the clients, the controller and model of one match.
Author:
Stefano Fossati

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Room​(int roomNumber, Server server)
    Constructs the room initialising default attributes and creates controllers of connection and of the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addConnectionToClient​(java.lang.String name, ConnectionToClient connection, boolean reconnection)
    Adds the new connection with a client to the list of all the actually connections with this room.
    void eliminateRoom()
    Eliminates the room from the map of all the rooms in the server.
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ConnectionToClient> getConnections()
    Getter synchronized of all the connection with the clients currently connected to this room.
    DisconnectionHandler getDisconnectionHandler()
    Getter of the disconnection handler of this room.
    int getNumPlayer()
    Getter of the number of player of this room.
    java.lang.String getPlayerSendNumPlayer()  
    int getRoomNumber()
    Getter of the number of this room.
    boolean isFullPlayer()
    Getter of the boolean that indicates if all the client/player are connected with this room.
    boolean isSendNumPlayer()
    Getter of the boolean that indicates if the number player request is already send.
    boolean isStart()
    Getter of the boolean that indicates if the game has already started.
    void setDisconnectionHandler​(DisconnectionHandler disconnectionHandler)
    Sets the disconnection handler of this room.
    void setFullPlayer​(boolean fullPlayer)
    Sets if all the client are connected in this match.
    void setNumPlayer​(int numPlayer)
    Sets the number of players of the match in this room.
    void setPlayerSendNumPlayer​(java.lang.String playerSendNumPlayer)  
    void setSendNumPlayer​(boolean sendNumPlayer)
    Sets if the number of player request for this room is already send to the first client connected or not.
    void startGame()
    Starts the match when all the players/clients are connected.

    • Room

      public Room​(int roomNumber, Server server)
      Constructs the room initialising default attributes and creates controllers of connection and of the game.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The number of the room of the match.
      server - The server of the game.

    • setSendNumPlayer

      public void setSendNumPlayer​(boolean sendNumPlayer)
      Sets if the number of player request for this room is already send to the first client connected or not.
      Parameters:
      sendNumPlayer - The boolean that indicates if the number player request is already send.

    • setFullPlayer

      public void setFullPlayer​(boolean fullPlayer)
      Sets if all the client are connected in this match.
      Parameters:
      fullPlayer - Is set true if all the player are connected to this room, else is set false.

    • getRoomNumber

      public int getRoomNumber()
      Getter of the number of this room.
      Returns:
      The number of this room.

    • getConnections

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ConnectionToClient> getConnections()
      Getter synchronized of all the connection with the clients currently connected to this room.
      Returns:
      The map with all the current connected players.

    • getNumPlayer

      public int getNumPlayer()
      Getter of the number of player of this room.
      Returns:
      The number of player of this room.

    • getDisconnectionHandler

      public DisconnectionHandler getDisconnectionHandler()
      Getter of the disconnection handler of this room.
      Returns:
      The disconnection handler of this room.

    • isSendNumPlayer

      public boolean isSendNumPlayer()
      Getter of the boolean that indicates if the number player request is already send.
      Returns:
      It is true if the number player request is already send, else is false.

    • isStart

      public boolean isStart()
      Getter of the boolean that indicates if the game has already started.
      Returns:
      It is true if the game is already started, else false.

    • isFullPlayer

      public boolean isFullPlayer()
      Getter of the boolean that indicates if all the client/player are connected with this room.
      Returns:
      True if all the player are connected, else false.

    • addConnectionToClient

      public void addConnectionToClient​(java.lang.String name, ConnectionToClient connection, boolean reconnection)
      Adds the new connection with a client to the list of all the actually connections with this room.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player of the connection.
      connection - Teh connection with the client.
      reconnection - The boolean that indicates if the client has done a reconnection, or not.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the match when all the players/clients are connected.

    • eliminateRoom

      public void eliminateRoom()
      Eliminates the room from the map of all the rooms in the server.
